sense.gloss: to indulge in, to give oneself up to, to be obsessed by
to be engrossed in, to be lost in, to be absorbed in
aestheticism, pursuit of beauty, obsession with beautiful things
indulgence (in alcohol, women, etc.), debauchery, dissipation
a fast (dissolute) life, a life of follies, a life given to dissolute pleasures

r_ele.r: かんがえごとにふける

sense.gloss: be absorbed in deep thought, be sunk in thought
to be absorbed in thought, to muse, to muse about, to think things through
to be lost in thought, to be immersed in reverie
indulging in pleasure, giving oneself up to enjoyment
to be lost in deep thought, to be deeply immersed in thought

sdata.j: ジャックは↑物思↑↓ものおも↓いに↑耽↑↓ふけ↓って↑部屋↑↓へや↓の↑中↑↓なか↓を↑行↑↓い↓ったり↑来↑↓き↓たりしていた。
sdata.e: Jack was pacing up and down in the room, lost in thought.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓たちは↑酒↑↓さけ↓と↑会話↑↓かいわ↓に↑耽↑↓ふけ↓った。
sdata.e: We indulged in conversation and drink.

sdata.j: チャルズは↑若↑↓わか↓い↑時↑↓とき↓に↑放蕩↑↓ほうとう↓↑生活↑↓せいかつ↓に↑耽溺↑↓たんでき↓していました。
sdata.e: Charles lived a life of debauchery when he was young.

sdata.j: ↑勤務↑↓きんむ↓↑中↑↓ちゅう↓なのに↑職員↑↓しょくいん↓の↑目↑↓め↓を↑盗↑↓ぬす↓んでインターネットに↑耽溺↑↓たんでき↓する。
sdata.e: Even during work, I secretly indulge my Internet addiction.
